column1: #mapping_set_description: Mapping from IBM AI Capabilities to AI Tasks

column9: Essential for understanding questions and context
Critical for multi-turn QA and context-dependent questions
Required for inference-based and reasoning questions
Must understand source text to summarize
Understanding overall context and key points
Must understand text to classify it
Must generate fluent target language text
Preserving context and meaning across languages
Reasoning about program logic and control flow
Knowledge of programming languages and APIs
Understanding code as a form of text
Must understand existing code to edit it
Generating modified or new code sections
Reasoning about code changes and their effects
Essential for understanding document content and questions
Required for reasoning about document structure and content
Reasoning about table data and relationships
Reasoning about relationships in tabular data
Understanding tabular data and numerical relationships
Reasoning about numerical patterns and relationships
Query rewrite requires understanding conversational context
Understanding user intent in multi-turn conversation
Reasoning about whether question is answerable
Avoiding hallucination by determining when not to answer
Reasoning about relative relevance of passages
